description: Proof of transaction in a block.

hashtype.description:
The type of hash function used to create the proof, must be one of: 
* sha512_256 
* sha256

idx.description: Index of the transaction in the block's payset.

stibhash.description: Hash of SignedTxnInBlock for verifying proof.

treedepth.description: Represents the depth of the tree that is being proven, i.e. the number of edges from a leaf to the root.
